ElementDescription: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject
Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project
Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY
Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging.
Notes: Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

ElementDescription: Sex of subject at birth
Notes: M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

ElementDescription: How often do you reassure your child?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: How often did you provide items needed because of anxiety?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: How often did you participate in behaviors related to your child's anxiety?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: How often did you assist your child in avoiding things that might make them anxious?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: Have you avoided doing things, going places or being with people because of your child's anxiety?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: Have you modified your family routine because of your child's symptoms?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: Have you had to do things that would usually be your child's responsibility?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: Have you modified your work schedule because of your child's anxiety?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: Have you modified your leisure activity because of your child's anxiety?
Notes: 0= never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= daily

ElementDescription: Does helping your child in these ways cause you distress?
Notes: 0= no; 1= mild; 2= moderate; 3= severe; 4= extreme

ElementDescription: Has your child become distressed when you have not provided assurance? To what degree?
Notes: 0= no; 1= mild; 2= moderate; 3= severe; 4= extreme

ElementDescription: Has your child become angry / abusive when not provided assitance? To what degree?
Notes: 0= no; 1= mild; 2= moderate; 3= severe; 4= extreme

ElementDescription: Has your child's anxiety been worse when you have not provided assurance? How much worse?
Notes: 0= no; 1= mild; 2= moderate; 3= severe; 4= extreme

ElementDescription: Participation scale score
Modification scale score
Distress scale score
Consequences scale score
Total Family Accommodation Scale score
Notes: 888= Not applicable; 999= Missing

ElementDescription: My parent gets upset when he/she helps me in these ways.
Notes: 0= strongly disagree; 1= disagree; 2= neither agree nor disagree; 3= agree; 4= strongly agree

ElementDescription: I get upset if my parent does not help me in these ways.
Notes: 0= strongly disagree; 1= disagree; 2= neither agree nor disagree; 3= agree; 4= strongly agree

ElementDescription: I get angry if my parent does not help me in these ways.
Notes: 0= strongly disagree; 1= disagree; 2= neither agree nor disagree; 3= agree; 4= strongly agree

ElementDescription: My anxiety gets worse if my parent does not help me in these ways.
Notes: 0= strongly disagree; 1= disagree; 2= neither agree nor disagree; 3= agree; 4= strongly agree

ElementDescription: When my parent helps me in these ways, I feel less anxious.
Notes: 0= strongly disagree; 1= disagree; 2= neither agree nor disagree; 3= agree; 4= strongly agree

ElementDescription: If my parent continues to help me in these ways, I will feel less anxious in the future.
Notes: 0= strongly disagree; 1= disagree; 2= neither agree nor disagree; 3= agree; 4= strongly agree

ElementDescription: I believe my parent should help me less in these ways when I?m anxious.
Notes: 0= strongly disagree; 1= disagree; 2= neither agree nor disagree; 3= agree; 4= strongly agree

ElementDescription: How often did your parent change his/her work schedule because of your anxiety?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent change his/her fun plans because of your anxiety (like cancelling an activity because you did not want him/her to leave)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent reassure you (like tell you that you do not need to worry, tell you something is ok)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent give you things to make you feel better because you were anxious?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent participate in (do with you) the things you do because you feel anxious?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent help you avoid things that make you feel anxious (like tell your teacher not to call on you in class, let you stay home from school)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent avoid doing things, going places or being with people because of your anxiety?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent change the family routine because of your anxiety (like changing bed time, chores, or other routines)?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent do things for you that you were supposed to do yourself, because of your anxiety?
Notes: 0= Never; 1= 1-3 times a month; 2= 1-2 times a week; 3= 3-6 times a week; 4= Daily

ElementDescription: How often did your parent reassure you (like tell you that you do not need to worry, tell you something is ok)?
Notes: 0= Very rarely; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Very often

ElementDescription: How often did your parent give you things to make you feel better because you were anxious?
Notes: 0= Very rarely; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Very often

ElementDescription: How often did your parent participate in (do with you) the things you do because you feel anxious?
Notes: 0= Very rarely; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Very often

Notes: 0= Very rarely; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Very often

Notes: 0= Very rarely; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Very often

Notes: 0= Very rarely; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Very often

Notes: 0= Very rarely; 1= Rarely; 2= Sometimes; 3= Often; 4= Very often
